magicLink.title: Welcome
magicLink.description: Enter your email to sign in or create an account.
magicLink.success: Check your email for a link to continue.
magicLink.error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

completeRegistration.title: Complete Registration
completeRegistration.description: Choose a username to finish setting up your account.
completeRegistration.error: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

expiredLink.title: Link Expired
expiredLink.message: This authentication link has expired. Magic links are only valid for a limited time for security reasons.

invalidLink.title: Invalid Link
invalidLink.message: This authentication link is invalid or malformed. Please request a new one.

alreadyUsed.title: Link Already Used
alreadyUsed.message: This authentication link has already been used. Each magic link can only be used once for security reasons.

noTokens.title: Authentication Failed
noTokens.message: We couldn't find the authentication tokens in your request. This usually happens when the link is incomplete or corrupted.

sessionFailed.title: Session Creation Failed
sessionFailed.message: We couldn't establish your session. This might be due to a temporary server issue or invalid credentials.

unexpectedError.title: Something Went Wrong
unexpectedError.message: An unexpected error occurred during authentication. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

generic.title: Authentication Error
generic.message: There was a problem with your authentication request. Please try again.

authError.helpText: If you continue to experience issues, please contact our support team.

logout.title: You're Logged Out
logout.description: You have been successfully logged out from your account. Thanks for using Tour Planner!
